com.paydiant.android.bluetooth.ble

Interface IBLEServiceProvider


  • public interface IBLEServiceProvider
    Defines the set of operations currently supported by the BLE Service Provider implementations.
    Since:
    4.9.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BLE_NO_SERVICES_DEFINED_ERROR
      No service UUIDs provided during scanning.
      static int BLE_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR
      Status indicating that the device doesn't support BLE features.
      static int BLE_STATE_TURNED_OFF
      Device's local Bluetooth adapter has been turned off.
      static int BLE_STATE_TURNED_ON
      Device's local Bluetooth adapter has been turned on.
      static int BLE_STATE_TURNING_OFF
      Device's local Bluetooth is currently turning off.
      static int BLE_STATE_TURNING_ON
      Device's local Bluetooth is currently turning on.
      static int BLE_UNKNOWN_ERROR
      Unknown error occurred during scanning.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBLEStatus()
      Checks the current BLE status.
      void init(Context context)
      Initialize the current IBLEServiceProvider instance.
      boolean isScanning()
      Checks whether the Bluetooth adapter is scanning for BLE devices.
      void release()
      Releases all resources used by this BLEServiceProvider implementation and perform the necessary cleanup operations.
      void setBLEServiceProviderListener(IBLEServiceProviderListener listener)
      Sets the IBLEServiceProviderListener listener implementation to handle relevant BLE callbacks.
      int startScan(UUID[] serviceUuids)
      Starts scanning for BLE devices matching the provided Service UUIDs.
      int startScan(UUID[] serviceUuids, long timeout)
      Starts scanning for BLE devices matching the provided Service UUIDs and will continue scanning until the specified timeout occurs.
      void stopScan()
      Stop scanning BLE devices.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(Context context)
        Initialize the current IBLEServiceProvider instance.
        Parameters:
        context - - Android Context instance.

      • getBLEStatus

        int getBLEStatus()
                 throws BLEServiceProviderException
        Checks the current BLE status. Values returned from this would be either one of BLE_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR, BLE_STATE_TURNED_OFF or BLE_STATE_TURNED_ON.
        Returns:
        one of BLE_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR, BLE_STATE_TURNED_OFF or BLE_STATE_TURNED_ON values indicating the current BLE status.
        Throws:
        BLEServiceProviderException - - Error occurred invoking this method.

      • startScan

        int startScan(UUID[] serviceUuids)
              throws BLEServiceProviderException
        Starts scanning for BLE devices matching the provided Service UUIDs. If null or empty array passed as serviceUuids, then this will work in "beacon mode".
        Parameters:
        serviceUuids - - List of UUID of services to match. If null or empty array provided, this will work in "beacon mode".
        Returns:
        status of the scan. Can be one of the statuses such as BLE_STATE_TURNED_ON, BLE_STATE_TURNED_OFF etc.
        Throws:
        BLEServiceProviderException - - Error occurred invoking this method.

      • startScan

        int startScan(UUID[] serviceUuids,
            long timeout)
              throws BLEServiceProviderException
        Starts scanning for BLE devices matching the provided Service UUIDs and will continue scanning until the specified timeout occurs. . If null or empty array passed as serviceUuids, then this will work in "beacon mode".
        Parameters:
        serviceUuids - - List of UUID of services to match. If null or empty array provided, this will work in "beacon mode".
        timeout - - timeout to wait for successful lookup of service Uuids
        Returns:
        status of the scan. Can be one of the statuses such as BLE_STATE_TURNED_ON, BLE_STATE_TURNED_OFF etc.
        Throws:
        BLEServiceProviderException - - Error occurred invoking this method.

      • isScanning

        boolean isScanning()
                   throws BLEServiceProviderException
        Checks whether the Bluetooth adapter is scanning for BLE devices.
        Returns:
        true if the adapter is scanning for devices
        Throws:
        BLEServiceProviderException - - Error occurred invoking this method.

      • stopScan

        void stopScan()
              throws BLEServiceProviderException
        Stop scanning BLE devices.
        Throws:
        BLEServiceProviderException

      • release

        void release()
             throws BLEServiceProviderException
        Releases all resources used by this BLEServiceProvider implementation and perform the necessary cleanup operations.
        Throws:
        BLEServiceProviderException - - Error occurred invoking this method.

      • setBLEServiceProviderListener

        void setBLEServiceProviderListener(IBLEServiceProviderListener listener)
                                   throws BLEServiceProviderException
        Sets the IBLEServiceProviderListener listener implementation to handle relevant BLE callbacks.
        Parameters:
        listener - - instance of IBLEServiceProviderListener.
        Throws:
        BLEServiceProviderException - - Error occurred invoking this method.
